db:select.doc:name: Get Data from ERP
db:select.db:sql: SELECT d.DetailID, d.PrimaryValue as PrimValue, d.ProductName, d.ProductImageURL, d.ProductURL, d.ProductID, d.ProductSKU, d.ProductVariant, d.Quantity, d.Price, d.TotalPrice, d.EstimatedShipDate, d.EstimatedArrivalDate, d.TrackingID, d.TrackingURL, d.ShippingMethod, d.ShipDate, d.CustomerEmail, h.* FROM master.dbo.detail d INNER JOIN master.dbo.header h ON d.PrimaryValue =h.PrimaryValue

ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { token: payload.KlaviyoToken[0], event: payload.MessageEvent[0], customer_properties: { "first_name": splitBy(payload.ManagerName[0]," ")[0], "last_name": splitBy(payload.ManagerName[0]," ")[1], "region": payload.ShippingState[0], "email": payload.CustomerEmail[0], "phone_number": payload.ShippingPhone[0], }, properties: { Line_Item: payload map ( payload01 , indexOfPayload01 ) -> { "Product Name": payload01.ProductName, "Product Image URL": payload01.ProductImageURL, "Product URL": payload01.ProductURL, "Product ID": payload01.ProductID, "Product SKU": payload01.ProductSKU, "Product Variant": payload01.ProductVariant, Quantity: payload01.Quantity as Number, Price: payload01.Price as Number, "Total Price": payload01.TotalPrice as Number, "Estimated Ship Date": payload01.EstimatedShipDate }, Profile: { "Customer Email Address": payload.CustomerEmailAddress[0], "Order Number": payload.OrderNumber[0], "Store Name": payload.StoreName[0], "Shipping Name": payload.ShippingName[0], "Shipping Company": payload.ShippingCompany[0], "Shipping Address Line 1": payload.ShippingAddressLine1[0], "Shipping Address Line 2": payload.ShippingAddressLine2[0], "Shipping City": payload.ShippingCity[0], "Shipping State": payload.ShippingState[0], "Shipping Zip Code": payload.ShippingZipCode[0], "Shipping Country": payload.ShippingCountry[0], "Shipping Phone": payload.ShippingPhone[0], "Billing Name": payload.BillingName[0], "Billing Company": payload.BillingCompany[0], "Billing Address Line 1": payload.BillingAddressLine1[0], "Billing Address Line 2": payload.BillingAddressLine2[0], "Billing City": payload.BillingCity[0], "Billing State": payload.BillingState[0], "Billing Zip Code": payload.BillingZipCode[0], "Billing Country": payload.BillingCountry[0], "Billing Phone": payload.BillingPhone[0] } } }

%dw 2.0 output application/x-www-form-urlencoded --- { To: "3126186886", From: "+1 312 618 6886", Body: "Hello " ++ payload.customer_properties."first_name" ++ " " ++ payload.customer_properties."last_name" ++ ",Great news! Your order have shipped!" }

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- "

 

 

SHIPPING CONFIRMATION

Order Number: " ++ payload.properties.Profile."Order Number" ++ "

Hello " ++ payload.customer_properties."first_name" ++ " " ++ payload.customer_properties."last_name" ++ ", Great news! The following item(s) from your order have shipped! You can track your order at any time at 1800lighting.com/track-your-order/. Details are as follows:

 

 

" ++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Product Name" ++ "

" ++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Product Variant" ++ "

Quantity Shipped: "++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Quantity" as String ++ "

Capitol ID: "++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Product ID" as String ++ "
Manufacturer SKU: "++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Product SKU" as String ++ "

Shipped On: "++ payload.properties.Line_Item[0]."Estimated Ship Date" as String ++ "
Service: "++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping Company" as String++ "

Tracking ID: "++ payload.properties.Profile."Order Number" as String ++ "

 

SHIPPING INFORMATION:

" ++ payload.customer_properties."first_name" ++ " " ++ payload.customer_properties."last_name" ++ "
"++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping Address Line 1" as String ++ "
"++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping City" as String ++ ", "++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping State" as String ++ ", "++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping Zip Code" as String ++ " "++ payload.properties.Profile."Shipping Country" as String ++ "

BILLING INFORMATION:

"++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing Name" as String ++ "
"++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing Address Line 1" as String ++ "
"++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing City" as String ++ ", "++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing State" as String ++ ", "++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing Zip Code" as String ++ " "++ payload.properties.Profile."Billing Country" as String ++ "

 

NEED HELP WITH YOUR ORDER?

Visit our customer care page to access FAQs, submit an order inquiry or contact us. Agents are available 7 days a week.

 

If there are any outstanding items on your purchase, you will receive subsequent emails as this merchandise ships or if the status changes.

 

 

 

 

 

© 2022 Capitol Lighting. All Rights Reserved.

Capitol Lighting | 365 State Route 10 East Hanover, New Jersey 07936

Privacy Policy  |  Manage Preferences  |  Unsubscribe

 

Payment options through Affirm are provided by these lending partners: affirm.com/lenders.
Subject to eligibility.

\‌
"
